title: What's under my bed?
brief_description: Grandpa’s bedtime story scares two young children out of bed and back to his armchair where they discover that he was once young boy too, scared of the creatures under the bed. Between the three of them they are able to dispel most of the myths that frighten children during the night. Voices supplied by Barnard Hughes, Melissa Cayanni and Peter Prinstein. From the book by James Stevenson.
